name: That time I got Reincarnated while working for a delivery company and continued my job.
name_original: That time I got Reincarnated while working for a delivery company and continued my job.
description:
That time I got Reincarnated while working for a delivery company and continued my job.

A story about a Mazonia company working getting transported to another world, fated to continue their job like normal as an adventurer. Life continues returning packages to their rightful owners - but how long with these slow days last? Will Jim, our new adventurer, be able to return himself home?

Created for the Game / Music Jam 2021 - 
https://itch.io/jam/gmjam2021

Supporting the Able Gamers Charity
https://tinyurl.com/GMJ21Fundraiser

Full Game / Music Jam Schedule

November 5-7 — GAME JAM (Devs)
November 12-14 — MUSIC JAM (Composers)
December 3-4 — Optional Mixing and Implementation (Devs and Composers) December 5 — FINAL SHOWCASE

Development will continue over the month towards the final showcase.
Roadmap includes polishing existing levels and code, as well as populating additional quest areas. An introduction sequence is also planned.

If you have any comments or ideas for the game, please let us know in the comments below.

Credits:

48-hour build is downloadable.
The online version has a bug fix [fixes compile/export issue with one variable)
*created using Godot with no pre-existing assets*
